All Classes

Class Description
Board
Used to keep track of information about the board
Building
A class to represent a building (city/settlement)
Card
A superclass for the resource and development cards
Client
The client used to send and receive game info to and from the server
DevelopmentCard
A development card, stores which type it is using DevelopmentCardType
Game
Used to keep track of and manage the current game
GUI
The core GUI class used to launch the Client program
Player
This class is used to keep track of the player's cards, color, and victory points
PlayerColor
Indicates the player color of something, either no color, red, orange, white, or blue
ResourceCard
A resource card, stores which type it is using ResourceCardType
Road
A class used to store information about a road.
RoadGUI
A class used by the GUI to help display roads
Server
The server used to manage the game and send state updates to the clients
Settlement
A class used by the GUI to help display settlements
Tile
Stores which type it is using TileType.
Tuple<T,​K>
A simple class to store a tuple of two of any type of objects.
